001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.NumberTypeAgnostic;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
008
009public interface LinearModelOptimizer<N extends Number> extends NumberTypeAgnostic<N>, Optimizer<LinearBasisFunctionModel<N>, N> {
010
011    void setOptimalWeights(LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> regression, DataSet<N> trainSet);
012
013    @Override
014    default void optimize(LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> estimationFunction, DataSet<N> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction<N> objective, int step) {
015        setOptimalWeights(estimationFunction, trainingSet);
016    }
017
018}
